title: A new digital and cyber playbook to support local government during reorganisation

content.text: We are pleased to share that the first release of our Local Government Reorganisation (LGR) Digital and Cyber Playbook is now live.

The Playbook is an evolving collection of guidance, council experiences, and templates to support councils navigating the digital, data, technology and cyber aspects of local government reorganisation. The content responds directly to questions raised by practitioners in councils undergoing LGR.
The Playbook is designed for anyone leading and supporting reorganisation activity with a focus on digital, data and technology, including:

The Playbook has been developed collaboratively with colleagues across local government, central government, sector bodies and suppliers, who  shared their time, experience and expertise. It draws on conversations with  those who have been through reorganisation, offering insights they wish  they’d had when they first started.
